title: Sustainable Citrus & Ice Program
system_mod: Focus on low-waste prep, stabilized juice strategies, reclaimed ice/water cycles, and vendor options that maintain quality.
venue_context: Coastal restaurant group with two bars. Citrus waste is high and freezer space is limited. Management wants greener ops without taste tradeoffs.
prompt: Design a low-waste citrus and ice program. Include stabilized/clarified juice options, when to use high-quality bottled juice vs fresh, freeze/thaw guidance, reclaimed ice/water practices, and a monthly waste audit checklist.
